title: 36. "Becoming" 7 Ways to Tell You Are Making Progress in Your Self Love Journey
description:
In this episode, we talk about how to tell that you are making progress in your self love journey. Sometimes we don't give ourselves enough credit for all our efforts, all that we learn, and all that we apply from what we learn. Everyday we become a better version of ourselves and in this episode, we dive deeper into seeing just how we do it.

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Click here to grab your free guide on the 5 Daily Tips on How to Stop Caring What Other People Think
